name: Aquariox MK.X.2K
description:
Aquariox MK.X.2K A relaxing fish tank simulator

Inspired by insaniquarium but less hyper, more chill.

Meet the fishies

Currently there are 3 different fishies with different characteristics:

  • Perch
    • Likes to go FAST!
    • Loot drop chance increased depending on speed
  • Mullet
    • Likes friends -w-
    • Loot drop chance increased when it's near lotsa friends
  • Giant Goldfish
    • Likes being happy and fed
    • Loot drop chance increased by both happiness and low hunger

There are 4 tiers of loot right now, common, rare, epic, and legendary. Legendary is very rare. 

Loot right now is either a coin of a certain rarity, or food. Fish try to eat food when they're hungry but they're kinda dumb so don't expect a lot from them -w- You can help them by nudging them. 

Controls

Mouse -> Control your HAND

Click -> Taps somewhere, nudging and scaring fish away, and grabbing coins in a radius

M -> Mute the background music

ESC -> Quits the game (and saves your progress)

Saving is a bit mcdonalds tier right now, it saves your money but creates new fish (equal to the amount u had when u saved) on startup so you might have different fish.

The source is open and on github:

https://github.com/harofax/Aquariox-MKX2000
